definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: Mangos are not in season now.
Focus on a variety of seasonal berries and add them to plain, no-fat yogurt.
sentences.chinese: 把各種時令漿果加進清淡無脂的酸奶中，效果更好。

sentences.english: Be in different area, can according to local season, the choice spends material worthily .
sentences.chinese: 在不同的地區，可以根據當地時令，選擇適宜花材。

sentences.english: The fresh only for a season.
It is the middle of the summer, but there is an unseasonal mist pressing against the windowpanes .
sentences.chinese: 現在是仲夏，窗玻璃上卻蒙着一層不合時令的霧氣。

sentences.english: A long, lean cardigan is a contemporary upgrade.
sentences.chinese: 一件斜紋長羊毛衫纔是當前的時令。

sentences.english: The goods we ordered are seasonal goods. Could you ship them all at once?
sentences.chinese: 我們訂購的這批貨都是時令商品，你方能否一次裝船？

sentences.english: How can the southeast wind blow in this season?
sentences.chinese: 這個時令，哪有東南風呢？

sentences.english: A patented EVA midsole that allows water to channel out of wet shoes as you walk.
sentences.chinese: 專利的EVA中底使你在步行時令水排出弄溼的鞋子。

sentences.english: For example, many people often died of hot weather.
sentences.chinese: 時令已進入中伏，越來越多的人抱怨天氣太熱。

sentences.english: Season of mists and mellow fruitfulness.
sentences.chinese: 霧靄的季節，果實圓熟的時令。

sentences.english: Not only is summer a hot season but also diseases are apt to happen.
sentences.chinese: 炎天沒有成是個酷熱的時令，而且徐病也隨便產死。

sentences.english: It will, I imagine, big up British and seasonal.
sentences.chinese: 我猜，會是時令的英格蘭高級菜系。

sentences.english: Season has entered the Zhongfu, more and more people complain about the hot weather .
sentences.chinese: 時令已進入中伏，越來越多的人抱怨天氣太熱。

sentences.english: He was sweating mightily in his unseasonable suit.
sentences.chinese: 他穿着不合時令的西裝而汗流浹背。

sentences.english: For such a substantial order, we hope to have the goods dispatched by sea.
sentences.chinese: 我們訂購的這批貨都是時令商品，你方能否一次裝船？

definition: to choose for some purpose/to select and use
to transform/to convert/to vary/to alternate/a transformation
to take a tonic (for one's health)
to echo one another/to respond (in agreement)
